query:
SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.email, mw.wallet_address
        FROM platforms m
        INNER JOIN mpc_wallets mw ON m.id = mw.platform_id
        WHERE mw.is_active = TRUE
          AND (
              -- Recent payments
              EXISTS (
                  SELECT 1 FROM payments p 
                  WHERE p.platform_id = m.id 
                    AND p.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
              )
              OR
              -- Recent withdrawals
              EXISTS (
                  SELECT 1 FROM withdrawals w
                  WHERE w.platform_id = m.id
                    AND w.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
              )
              OR
              -- Active session keys
              EXISTS (
                  SELECT 1 FROM session_keys sk
                  WHERE sk.platform_id = m.id
                    AND sk.is_active = TRUE
                    AND sk.expires_at > NOW()
              )
          )
        ORDER BY m.id
        LIMIT 50
